name: What We Do In The Washroom
name_original: What We Do In The Washroom
description:
You're Piotr, a vampire with an important mission; to get to the only open bathroom available in this hotel! To make matters worse, tonight they decided to host the biggest Vampire Hunter event of the year, Helsing-CON, and they're being sponsored by Looking Glass Co., the premiere mirror vendor in the world. Will you be able to sneak in and make it before it's too late?

Controls:

WASD to Move

Space to Interact

Esc to Exit
